title: LF Rank Team!
body:
Looking for a serious Ranked Team!

IGN: Thuy
LANES: Preferred Support Jungle also can play any rolls if need to!
Rank: Plat IV could be better but but didnt play rank in a while and dropped so had to climb back up

Availability: Monday --> Friday 5pm to 10pm
                  Saturday Sunday free.
Has skype just waiting for new headset to be delivered cause current one broke.

Interested recruit me!

replies.body: Well my team consists of gold/plats and you can't just try our team out for a bit see if you like it or not or it doesn't have to be your main team http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/MIAPlElt-looking-for-goldplat-players-from-season-4-and-willing-to-start-a-semi-serious-ranked-team?sort_type=recent
Yeah ill add you play with you for fun, if you need help or need filler do call i have added you
